description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. EXPLODIMALS is a fast-paced physics-puzzle-platformer. Play as a bouncy, rolling animal head that shoots bombs from its mouth and loves cake!  Roll a giant chicken down a hill, blast pandas out of a circus cannon, bounce along a carpet of monkeys: it may not make sense, but it has 100 levels, destructible environments, customizable characters, unlockable hats, and a 3DTV mode!
description.short: EXPLODIMALS is a fast-paced physics-puzzle-platformer. Play as a bouncy, rolling animal head that shoots bombs from its mouth and loves cake!  Roll a giant chicken down a hill, blast pandas out of a circus cannon, bounce along a carpet of monkeys: it may not make sense, but it has 100 levels, destructible environments, customizable characters, unlockable hats, and a 3DTV mode!
